name: Arkan Qufan (Tutorial Demo)
description:
A fast pace 2d rpg platformer.

Just 5 controls, up, down, left, right, and the shift button. 

Your jump height is controlled by your horizontal speed, whilst your damage output is controlled by the sum of the absolute values of your vertical and horizontal speed.

In summary, fast = best

The game is tied to my youtube channel lore, so if you're interested go ahead and watch these if you have time: U23RN6M3 - YouTube

Anyway, without futher ado, here's the download link. Thanks, have fun, and adieu.
